The [IMU's have noise](#!/osrf/handsim-proprietary/src/da395bf8adad0e30d45512da955f3b3923ce2bea/apl_description/objects/right_mpl_arm.gazebo.xacro?at=default):
~~~
   <xacro:macro name="imu_sensor" params="link">
     <gazebo reference="${link}">
       <sensor name="${link}_imu_sensor" type="imu">
         <always_on>1</always_on>
         <update_rate>1000.0</update_rate>
         <imu>
           <noise>
             <type>gaussian</type>
             <rate>
               <mean>0.0</mean>
               <stddev>2e-4</stddev>
               <bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean>
               <bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev>
             </rate>
             <accel>
               <mean>0.0</mean>
               <stddev>1.7e-2</stddev>
               <bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean>
               <bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev>
             </accel>
           </noise>
         </imu>
       </sensor>
     </gazebo>
~~~
We can adjust these parameters if they are incorrect, or set them to zero for debugging purposes, but there will be some noise.
